bug.author: jsato0807
bug.description: %tensorboard --logdir {logdir}/sizes を実行すると UsageError: Line magic function %tensorboard not found. となる。

comments.comment: Hi, this is the same issue described in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/pull/1580>tensorflow/docs#1580</denchmark-link> I believe this issue will be fixed by merging the PR.
thank you for teaching me about it.
